page.title: 20Religion in Frome
page.content: After nearly half a century of decline, Frome's churches are showing signs of growth. A great deal of change is being brought about by inter-church missionary activity, which is a feature of church life today. In l985 the town has 4 Anglican churches, 2 Methodist, one Baptist, a United Reformed, a Roman Catholic, 2 Evangelical, 1 Congregational and a small Friend's meeting. At Selwood School our survey amongst children showed 20% attended Sunday School regularly; & a survey of adults showed church attendance - regularly 19%, occasionally 38%, never 43%. Of those who attend, Anglicans were 30%, Methodist 6%, Baptist 2%, Catholic 5%, United Reformed 3% & others ll%.
